Mikasa Sports USA produces the best athletic balls money can buy for volleyball, water polo, basketball, soccer, rugby, football, and for the playground.

1 week ago - The company began its life producing many different types of rubber products, such as flip-flops and dodgeballs. It began using the Mikasa brand name on its sports products in 1935, and in the early 1940s was consolidated with a number of rival rubber companies.
